trans-unit.source: The first page is displayed if the thread parameter button is clicked. Use this page to set the new parameters.

seg-source.mrk: The first page is displayed if the thread parameter button is clicked.
Use this page to set the new parameters.

target.mrk: The first page is displayed if the thread parameter button is clicked.
Use this page to set the new parameters.

trans-unit.source: If either the maximum threads or time slice parameter is left blank, that value is left unchanged from the current setting.

seg-source.mrk: If either the maximum threads or time slice parameter is left blank, that value is left unchanged from the current setting.

target.mrk: If either the maximum threads or time slice parameter is left blank, that value is left unchanged from the current setting.

trans-unit.source: Click Set Network Server parameters to display the updated values for the maximum threads and the time slice parameters.

seg-source.mrk: Click Set Network Server parameters to display the updated values for the maximum threads and the time slice parameters.

target.mrk: Click Set Network Server parameters to display the updated values for the maximum threads and the time slice parameters.
